# agent(plistName:)

**Type Method**

Initializes an app service object with a launch agent with the property list name you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
class func agent(plistName: String) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **plistName**: The name of the property list corresponding to the [doc://com.apple.servicemanagement/documentation/ServiceManagement/SMAppService].

## Discussion

The property list name must correspond to a property list in the calling app’s `Contents/Library/LaunchAgents` directory.

## Managing apps

- **mainApp**: An app service object that corresponds to the main application as a login item.
- **daemon(plistName:)**: Initializes an app service object with a launch daemon with the property list name you provide.
- **loginItem(identifier:)**: Initializes an app service object for a login item corresponding to the bundle with the identifier you provide.
